document.full_text: a colorado woman who admitted her 13 month-old son drowned in the bathtub while she played on facebook was sentenced on friday to 10 years in prison, prosecutors said.
document.title: mom given 10 years for playing on facebook as baby drowned
lines_and_colors: a colorado woman who admitted her 13 month-old son drowned in the bathtub while she played on facebook was sentenced on friday to 10 years in prison, prosecutors said.
